BR_text.BRsummary: libTuriCreate.dylib does not contain the right symbols.
BR_text.BRdescription: After running build_capi.sh, it does not look like the right symbols are being exported in libTuriCreate.dylib or in the framework. For example, the following command finds nothing:  nm target/capi/libTuriCreate.dylib | grep -i sarray. Looking at nm target/capi/libTuriCreate.dylib seems it's missing pretty much all of the symbols.

comments_0.comment_text:
This was an issue as far back as <denchmark-link:https://github.com/apple/turicreate/commit/f3c5ea1a13db7a40fb4491e6ae329fb14af2a8c2>f3c5ea1</denchmark-link>
 
 It was working in <denchmark-link:https://github.com/apple/turicreate/commit/acd1422e82e4dabd6da7a3f82771dbf2f0474b1b>acd1422</denchmark-link>
